Spells:
Animate Plants (Verdant8 Tran): R75' 6 plants attack foes for 20 rd or entwine for 20 hr
Barkskin (Verdant2 Tran): Touched gains +5 natural armor for 200 min
Command Plants (Verdant4 Tran): R75' 40 HD plant creatures in 15' radius obey self for 20 dy (DC 17 Will neg)
Entangle (Verdant1 Tran): R1200' Creatures in 40' radius entangled for 20 min (DC 14 Ref neg)
Plant Shape III (Verdant7 Tran): Self becomes huge (+8 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +4 Constitution, +6 AC) plant creature for 20 min
Shambler (Verdant9 Conj): R300' Creates 1d4+2 advanced shambling mounds in 15' radius that fight for 7 dy or guard for 7 mo
Speak With Plants (Verdant3 Divi): Self converses w/plants for 20 min
Transport Via Plants (Verdant6 Conj): Self and 6 willing targets teleport via like plants for 1 rd
Wall Of Thorns (Verdant5 Conj): R300' 20 10' cu thorns inflict (25-AC) HP/rd when passing through for 200 min
Magic Notes:
Charisma Sorcerer Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level S1, S2, S3
Spell Focus (Necromancy): +1 Spell DC (Necromancy)
Bloodline Verdant: Casting personal spell gives +1/spell level to AC for 1d4 rd
Craft Wand: Create wand for up to 4th level spell
Ectoplasmic Spell: May cast spell targeting incorporeal or ethereal target; uses +1 spell slot
Elemental Spell (Acid): May convert half or all spell damage to acid damage; uses +1 spell slot
Eschew Materials: Cast spells w/out materials
Expanded Arcana: +1 spells known, or +2 of lower than max level
Massmorph: May use Plant Growth and Diminish Plants at will, Tree Shape or Plant Shape II 1/dy
Rooting: May suffer Speed reduction to 5' to gain +4 AC, +10 CMD vs. bull rush, overrun, reposition, and trip, 30' tremorsense, and regain 1 HP/rd for 20 min/dy
Thundering Spell: Target damaged by spell becomes deafened (spell save or Fort neg) for spell level rd; uses +2 spell slot
